name: biodegradable
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
able to decay naturally and in a way that is not harmful: Biodegradable packaging helps to limit the amount of harmful chemicals released into the atmosphere.

ENVIRONMENT able to decay naturally and in a way that is not harmful to the environment: The company, which makes biodegradable waste bags, has manufacturing plants in Italy and Germany. biodegradable materials/packaging/plastic
